title: Exercitium Progymnasmaticum Idque Germanico-Latino-Graeco-Ebraicum, Dramatis Instar De Domini Nostri Jesu Christi Nativitate In veteris Magdeburgi Gymnasio die XXV. Ianuarii sub ipsum octavae matutinae auspicium A.O.R. MDCLXXXVII. instituendum, ad quod perbenigne percipiendum Viros In Republica Magdeburgensium Summos, Medioxumos, Imos, Pios, Doctosquf Omnes, humaniter comiterq[ue] invitat Johannes Conradus Pott/ Gymnasii Conrector
creator: Pott, Johannes Conradus
subject: Historische Drucke
